item.title: How to handle remote resources with curl
item.description: When you need to get remote files to handle its content (i.e. csv files) you may find out that accesing them isn’t as easy as using fopen: <?php $handle = fopen($filename, "r") or die('could not open .' $filename); If this sentence works, we could then use the handle to parse the file with different php functions like fgetcsv(). Usually, a lot of functions use a Resource param to handle files, so it’s important to know how to get a handle from a file.
